bibl.title: BGU I 23: The Decadarch's Colletion.
bibl.note: Replies to: Pieter J. SIJPESTEIJN, Miscellanea papyrologica, ChrEg 66 (1991) Nos 131-132, pp. 279-280. - The interpretation of aivn as the name of the subordinate of Pasion, who is both decadarch and colletion, seems very unlikely. Suggests the elsewhere unattested reading αἰωνοκολλητίων. Revised text and translation.
bibl.seg: REA John, BGU I 23: The Decadarch's Colletion.
